paragraphs.text:
%r
lenses <- read.csv("/zeppelin/notebook/data/lenses.csv", sep="", header=FALSE)
lenses <- lenses[-1]
names(lenses) <- c('age', 'prescription', 'astigmatism', 'tears', 'classification')
library(plyr)
lenses$age <- factor(mapvalues(lenses$age, from = c('1','2','3'), to = c('young','adult','old')))
lenses$prescription <- factor(mapvalues(lenses$prescription, from = c('1','2'), to = c('nearsightednes','farsightednes')))
lenses$astigmatism <- factor(mapvalues(lenses$astigmatism, from = c('1','2'), to = c('astigmatic','non-astigmatic')))
lenses$tears <- factor(mapvalues(lenses$tears, from = c('1','2'), to = c('reduced','normal')))
lenses$classification <- factor(mapvalues(lenses$classification, from = c('1','2','3'), to = c('hard','soft','none')))
summary(lenses$age)
summary(lenses$prescription)
summary(lenses$astigmatism)
summary(lenses$tears)
summary(lenses$)

paragraphs.text:
%r
# install.packages("C50", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
library(C50)
simple_classifier <- C5.0(trainning_set[-5], trainning_set$classification)
summary(simple_classifier)

%r
test_result <- predict(simple_classifier, test_set)
# install.packages("gmodels", repos = "http://cran.us.r-project.org")
library(gmodels)
CrossTable(test_set$classification, test_result, prop.chisq = FALSE, prop.c = FALSE, prop.r = FALSE, dnn = c('actual type', 'predicted type'))
